argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatrhmval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatrhmval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | scmatrhmval.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 4 |  | scmatrhmval.t | |- .* = ( .s ` A ) |
| 5 |  | scmatrhmval.f | |- F = ( x e. K |-> ( x .* .1. ) ) |
| 6 |  | scmatrhmval.c | |- C = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 7 |  | scmatghm.s | |- S = ( A |`s C ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` A ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 11 | 2, 9, 1, 10, 6 | #P_scmatsrng | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> C e. ( SubRing ` A ) ) |
| 12 | 7 | #P_subrgring | |- ( C e. ( SubRing ` A ) -> S e. Ring ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> S e. Ring ) |
| 14 | 8, 13 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_scmatghm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` S ) = ( mulGrp ` S ) |
| 18 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 16, 17 | #P_scmatmhm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) |
| 19 | 15, 18 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 16, 17 | #P_isrhm | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) /\ ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F e. ( ( mulGrp ` R ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` S ) ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 14, 19, 20 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> F e. ( R RingHom S ) ) |
